scripts.vendor:copy: mkdir public/vendor && cp node_modules/angular-bootstrap/ui-bootstrap-tpls.min.js node_modules/angular-loading-bar/build/loading-bar.min.js node_modules/angular-loading-bar/build/loading-bar.min.css node_modules/angular-upload/angular-upload.min.js node_modules/chart.js/Chart.min.js node_modules/moment/min/moment.min.js public/vendor
scripts.js:uglify: cd public && uglifyjs js/app.js js/*/*.js -o g.min.js --source-map g.min.js.map
scripts.build: npm run vendor:clean && npm run vendor:copy && npm run js:uglify
scripts.watch: npm run build && watch 'npm run js:uglify' public/js
